channel.name: BBC4 UK
channel.title: Secrets of Bones
channel.desc: Ben Garrod delves into the surprising ways in which bone has evolved to help vertebrates sense the world around them, from wolves and sheep to the great grey owl.

channel.name: BBC4 UK
channel.title: War Walks
channel.desc: A journey through six centuries of warfare. Military historian Richard Holmes reviews the strategic importance of the Battle for Arras in 1940.

channel.name: BBC4 UK
channel.title: Code-Breakers
channel.desc: Documentary revealing how two men hacked into Hitler's personal super-code machine.

channel.name: BBC4 UK
channel.title: The Nazis
channel.desc: Documentary tracing the radicalisation of the Nazi policy against the Jews. Contains some scenes which some viewers may find upsetting.

channel.name: BBC4 UK
channel.title: Rise of the Nazis
channel.desc: The Nazis have lost in Moscow, and both dictators take charge of their armies.

channel.name: BBC4 UK
channel.title: Sebasti?o Salgado
channel.desc: A documentary from 1993 that visits Brazil, India and Paris to explore the work of photo-journalist Sebasti?o Salgado.
